name: The Pets Over The Innsmouth
description:
Come and harvest cute souls! The Pets Over The Innsmouth is a short idle game with cute little creatures, named "C"s. 

Click to smash meaningless mortals and get their souls. Upgrade your table for survival, reproduction, and your own good. Be careful not to kill too many of them. They can't self fertilize.

INTRODUCTION

This is 'C', the harmless creature.

Click to smash meaningless mortals and gether their souls.

HOW TO PLAY

Version 1.01

  • Hunger and thirst no longer decrease while sleeping
  • The day got shorter
  • Hunger drains faster
  • You can now purchase creatures consecutively
  • Now you can open and close the menu by pressing the esc button
  • Return to the title screen when the game is over
  • Game quits when pressing esc on title screen
  • No more fear in tents
  • Spirits now linger for a longer period of time
  • Time now freezes when opening the menu
  • Clicking when the UI and the creature overlap will no longer execute the creature

Version 1.02

  • Fixed an issue where animations were not displayed normally when feared while sleeping
  • Fixed volume when terrified
  • Fixed clicking collider when falling asleep  
  • Improved AI to now fill all houses as much as possible
  • Synced the water drinking animation and the water reducing animation, and the berry eating animation and the berry reducing animation

Sound Effect "Cloth, Bedding, brush, sweep-015.wav" by MattRuthSound / CC BY 4.0 Modified from original "Cyber Punch 03" by JohnLoser / CC BY 3.0 / Modified from original "Music Box, Happy Birthday.wav" by InspectorJ / CC BY 4.0 / Modified from original "yawn.wav" by kgatto / CC BY 3.0 / Modified from original
